e="preserve"> is a Japanese city in Nagasaki Prefecture on the island of Kyushu.
It has been recognized as a special city since 2001.
History.
In 1866, Sasebo was established as a major port for the Imperial Japanese Navy (IJN).
Sasebo became an American Naval base in 1945.
Today it is the center of a military district of the or JMSDF.
